模块 com.example.bubblebobble
程序包 com.ae2dms

类 GamePanel

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.GamePanel
public class GamePanel extends Object
The GamePanel is the director of this program, which contains the global variable of the game, like difficulty and theme. It contains method that can switch the scene, for example from menu page to game scene, from game scene to game over scene

  • 嵌套类概要

    嵌套类
    修饰符和类型
    类
    说明
    static class 
    GamePanel.Difficulty
    The enumeration of game difficulty, which can be modified in seeting page.
    static class 
    GamePanel.GameStatus
    The enum Game status, which is the status of the game, with different status gameScene(the model) would have different behavior.
    static class 
    GamePanel.Theme
    The enumeration of game theme,and can be modified in setting page.
